title: [Large-scale] Instructional Design Based on Learning Progressions (LP) for Understanding the Particulate Nature of Matter

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic physics concepts and pedagogical foundations
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service and in-service teachers, this program aims to enhance instructional design capabilities by understanding students' cognitive development stages regarding the particle nature of matter (PNM) and reflecting learning progressions (LP) in lesson planning

learning_goals: Explain students' cognitive developmental stages (Learning Progression, LP) regarding the particle nature of matter (PNM) in three or more distinct phases
Design teaching-learning activities for PNM based on Learning Progression (LP)
Diagnose students' understanding levels of particle nature concepts and provide at least two customized feedback strategies

resources: Particle nature of matter simulation tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
